author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR replaces ```convertCmToMm``` with ```/dd4hep::mm``` in order to make the dd4hep MTD ideal geometry test code insensitive to changes in the DD4hep baseline unit of measurements for length, as done for many other subsystems. #32488 takes care of the RECO level geometry update.

#### PR validation:

The unit test shows an identical description for both DDD and DD4hep.
title: MTD geometry: make dd4hep test independent on dd4hep length unit change
